text: Robinah Nabbanja (born 17 December 1969) is a Ugandan educator and politician who serves as the Prime Minister of Uganda since 2021. She is the first female prime minister of Uganda. Before, she was the State Minister of Health for General Duties between 14 December 2019 until 3 May 2021. She is also a Member of Parliament for Kakumiro District Women Constituency since 2016. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1969 births Category:Prime ministers of Uganda
title: Robinah Nabbanja
